question:
Make a model of rubber tire tread.

Choices:
A: Spray paint saran wrap to make rubber tire tread model.
B: Spray paint bubble wrap to make rubber tire tread model.
steps: Consider the appearance and texture of rubber tire treads. They have small, raised patterns to improve grip.
Identify which of the given choices better mimic the texture and appearance of tire treads.
Saran wrap is smooth and does not have a raised texture.
Bubble wrap has small, raised bubbles that can resemble the patterns found on tire treads.
Therefore, bubble wrap would better represent the rubber tire tread when spray painted.
Thus, the correct choice is B: Spray paint bubble wrap to make rubber tire tread model.
